title: 49. Was Paul Murdaugh Followed Before The Murder?
description:
A transcript from a hearing is released that alleges Paul Murdaugh was followed by a P.I. prior to Paul and Maggie's Murder.


Support this podcast at — https://redcircle.com/the-murdaugh-family-murders-impact-of-influence/donations
